plot: Sci-Trek searches for the answers to the daily life of the Neanderthal, and also examines the causes for the race's extinction.
title: Sci-Trek: Neanderthals
plot_es: Sci-Trek searches for the answers to the daily life of the Neanderthal, and also examines the causes for the race's extinction.
plot_en: Sci-Trek searches for the answers to the daily life of the Neanderthal, and also examines the causes for the race's extinction.
